DataElement.preferredName: MBSImP Component 15 Tongue Base Retraction Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric score for the assessment of tongue base (TB) retraction in the pharyngeal impairment section of the Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Tongue Base Retraction
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function._An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing._An observation of an individual's tongue base retraction during swallowing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Concepts.definition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Property.preferredName: Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Tongue Base Retraction
Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.:An observation of an individual's tongue base retraction during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.
An observation of an individual's tongue base retraction during swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: MBSImP:Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile, Martin-Harris et al., 2008
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: No visible posterior motion of TB

ValueMeaning.preferredName: No visible posterior motion of TB
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of no visible posterior motion of tongue base during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: No Visible Posterior Motion of Tongue Base During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of no visible posterior motion of tongue base during swallowing.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Wide column of contrast or air between TB and PW

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Wide column of contrast or air between TB and PW
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of a wide column of contrast or air between tongue base and posterior pharyngeal wall during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Wide Column of Contrast or Air Between Tongue Base and Posterior Pharyngeal Wall During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of a wide column of contrast or air between tongue base and posterior pharyngeal wall during swallowing.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Narrow column of contrast or air between TB and PW

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Narrow column of contrast or air between TB and PW
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of a narrow column of contrast or air between tongue base and posterior pharyngeal wall during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Narrow Column of Contrast or Air Between Tongue Base and Posterior Pharyngeal Wall During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of a narrow column of contrast or air between tongue base and posterior pharyngeal wall during swallowing.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Trace column of contrast or air between TB and PW

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Trace column of contrast or air between TB and PW
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of a trace column of contrast or air between tongue base and posterior pharyngeal wall during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Trace Column of Contrast or Air Between Tongue Base and Posterior Pharyngeal Wall During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of a trace column of contrast or air between tongue base and posterior pharyngeal wall during swallowing.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: No contrast between TB and posterior pharyngeal wall (PW)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: No contrast between TB and posterior pharyngeal wall (PW)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of no contrast between tongue base and posterior pharyngeal wall during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: No Contrast Between Tongue Base and Posterior Pharyngeal Wall During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of no contrast between tongue base and posterior pharyngeal wall during swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16
